dict.acceptation: 刚才；仅仅，只是；正好；刚要；
公正的，合理的；恰当的；合法的；正确的；

sent.orig: SAINT-JUST: The legislator commands the future.
sent.trans: 圣茹斯特(Saint-just)：立法者左右未来。

sent.orig: Around the cavernous main products, a series of products: BETTINA, NUVOLA, JUST so.
sent.trans: 主要产品都是环绕海绵，系列产品有：BETTINA,NUVOLA,JUST等。

sent.orig: Just-in-time management is the commercial equivalent of dialling for a pizza.
sent.trans: 在商业领域，实时管理(just-in-time)就如同叫比萨外卖。

sent.orig: Just-in-time (JIT) techniques are sometimes referred to as just-in-time production,just-in-time purchasing and just-in-time delivery.
sent.trans: 准时制技术有时称为准时制生产、准时制采购和准时制交付。

sent.orig: Just-in-time (JIT) techniques are sometimes referred just-in-time production just-in-time purchasing just-in-time delivery.
sent.trans: 准时制技术有时称准时制生产、准时制采购准时制交付。
